name: Operation: Defuse The Bomb Before Glitter Goes Everywhere
name_original: Operation: Defuse The Bomb Before Glitter Goes Everywhere
description:
___Operation Defuse The Bomb Before Glitter Goes Everywhere___

A game by mitzy

You play as Agent Periwinkle, one of Silly Street's new up and coming agents. HQ has tasked you to defuse glitter bombs placed all around the office that you must defuse within 10 seconds... good luck and godspeed!

__CONTROLS

Move Forward | W

Move Backwards | S

Move Left | A

Move Right | D

Sprint | Left Shift

Defuse | E

Return to Menu or Quit | Escape

Play with a keyboard, mouse **and a headset capable of 3d audio** for the full Operation Defuse The Bomb Before Glitter Goes Everywhere experience.
